participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and resourceful, Amina has a strong will and values her freedom and independence. She is empathetic and often thinks of others' struggles.
participant_1.background: i was forced to marry when i was a 17. my aunt helped me escape when i was 19. i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, Ethan has a passion for music and enjoys meeting people from different walks of life. He is compassionate and driven to make a difference.
participant_2.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter. i'm a piano teacher on the side. my father played violin professionally. i play several instruments.

content.text: Where do you live? Do you like your job? Wow, your father is so talented! What instruments do you play?
